actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize funds as a contribution by the United States to the costs of constructing an appropriate memorial statute of John A. "Snowshoe" Thompson, an early carrier of the U.S. mail.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to the curator of the Western American Skisport Museum at Boreal Ridge, California, the sum of $6,000 for the construction of the John A. "Snowshoe" Thompson statue. Requires that the curator of the Western American Skisport Museum make an accounting of all such sums paid by the Secretary of the Treasury. Directs that all sums not used for the statue shall be returned to the Treasury of the United States.

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize funds as a contribution by the United States to the costs of constructing an appropriate memorial statute of John A. "Snowshoe" Thompson, an early carrier of the U.S. mail.
